name: Webcam
tagline: webcam capture using openCV librrary in java
body:
Project goal is to give users possibility to access build-in or connected via USB webcams or remote IP / network cameras directly from Java code. Using provided libraries user is able to read camera images and detect motion.

### Authors and Contributors
Anmol Mann, currently pursuing undergraduation degree in bachelor's of computer sciences.

### Support or Contact
mann.anmol15@gmail.com
